name: 9ice
description: '''Akande Abolore Adegbola Alexander Ajifolajifaola''' (born '''Abolore Adegbola Akande'''; 17 January 1980) better known as '''9ice''' (pronounced '''nice'''), is a [[Nigerians|Nigerian]] singer, songwriter and dancer. He is known for his powerful use of the Yoruba language in his music and his proverbial lyrics and unique style of delivery.
